desc.en: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 他們遇到的敵人就是凱薩PMC。為了包圍對策委員會，PMC的兵力開始群湧而至。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly found out the there were signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone was shocked.
desc.jp: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly found out the there were signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone was shocked.
desc.thai: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly found out the there were signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone was shocked.
desc.ko: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly found out the there were signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone was shocked.
desc.zh_tw: 大家對這些人的歸屬與意圖都不明。這時綾音突然發現建築上有凱撒PMC（Private Military Company）的標誌，眾人吃了一驚。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Ayane pointed out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembered that there were some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It was at this time when everyone found that much troops were coming to them.
desc.jp: Ayane pointed out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembered that there were some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It was at this time when everyone found that much troops were coming to them.
desc.thai: Ayane pointed out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembered that there were some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It was at this time when everyone found that much troops were coming to them.
desc.ko: Ayane pointed out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembered that there were some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It was at this time when everyone found that much troops were coming to them.
desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此類軍事公司與頭盔團那些小混混並不一樣。野乃美突然記起以前好像聽說有企業僱傭退學的和不良學生為僱傭兵。這時眾人突然發現大量兵力在朝他們湧來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

name.zh_tw: 即使如此也未曾放棄的事物（1）
name.zh_cn_jp: 即使如此也未曾放弃的事物（1）
name.zh_cn_tw: 即使如此也未曾放弃的事物（1）
name.zh_cn_cn: 即使如此也未曾放弃的事物（1）

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_tw: 日步美與三一學園的支援，來到面對多數敵人的對策委員會一行人面前。對策委員會趁敵人陷入混亂，快速突破敵陣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.thai: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.ko: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_tw: 抵達阿拜多斯高中舊本館的對策委員會一行人。儘管凱薩PMC的幹部擋住他們的面前，不過晚來的亞瑠和便利屋68一行人即時出現幫助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亚瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亚瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was in front of the building's gate but was assaulted by the enemies. Hifumi, at this point, connected onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stressed these howitzer had nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force began to break through the lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force was in front of the building's gate but was assaulted by the enemies. Hifumi, at this point, connected onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stressed these howitzer had nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force began to break through the lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force was in front of the building's gate but was assaulted by the enemies. Hifumi, at this point, connected onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stressed these howitzer had nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force began to break through the lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force was in front of the building's gate but was assaulted by the enemies. Hifumi, at this point, connected onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stressed these howitzer had nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force began to break through the lines.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會眾人來到建築門口，遭到敵人阻攔。日步美此時接入通訊，向各位表示了情況，並著重提到這些榴彈炮與三一毫無關聯。通訊結束後，對策委員會幾人開始突破。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日富美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone came to the middle of the desert and recognized the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduced the situation here and mentioned about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director said they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 came and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrusted the combat to Problem Solver 68 and looked for Hoshino themselves.
desc.jp: Everyone came to the middle of the desert and recognized the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduced the situation here and mentioned about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director said they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 came and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrusted the combat to Problem Solver 68 and looked for Hoshino themselves.
desc.thai: Everyone came to the middle of the desert and recognized the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduced the situation here and mentioned about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director said they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 came and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrusted the combat to Problem Solver 68 and looked for Hoshino themselves.
desc.ko: Everyone came to the middle of the desert and recognized the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduced the situation here and mentioned about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director said they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 came and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrusted the combat to Problem Solver 68 and looked for Hoshino themselves.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人來到了沙漠中央，認出了曾經阿拜多斯學校的蹤跡。理事向各位簡單介紹了這裡的情況，並提到了黑服所稱的“實驗室”，就在另一邊的建築裡。但理事表示必須先過了他這一關，就在這時便利屋68全員趕到，開始支援。對策委員會將應戰責任委託給便利屋眾人，自己則前往尋找星野。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。对策委员会将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。对策委员会将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。对策委员会将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.thai: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.ko: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.zh_tw: 凱薩的幹部表明自己在找尋埋在阿拜多斯某處的寶物的野心，而且還利用債券壓迫對策委員會。星野帶著氣憤的對策委員會一行人暫時撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asked Hina whether she knew about Hoshino or not. Hina said it was the first time for her to meet her, and disclosed that she was listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino did seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.jp: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asked Hina whether she knew about Hoshino or not. Hina said it was the first time for her to meet her, and disclosed that she was listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino did seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.thai: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asked Hina whether she knew about Hoshino or not. Hina said it was the first time for her to meet her, and disclosed that she was listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino did seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.ko: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asked Hina whether she knew about Hoshino or not. Hina said it was the first time for her to meet her, and disclosed that she was listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino did seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_tw: 亞子說大話，稱自己能寫1000頁，結果陽奈真的按她說的做了。間隙，亞子詢問陽奈是否對星野知情。陽奈表示自己也是第一次見她，並說她曾經因能力被格黑娜情報機構列為潛在威脅物件；但又同意亞子的看法，星野這兩年來的確判若兩人。陽奈之後又提到了當時的戰鬥，認為如果繼續戰鬥，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能會損失慘重，批評亞子過於衝動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果日奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问日奈是否对星野知情。日奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。日奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.en: Despite all of this, Hina still couldn't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.jp: Despite all of this, Hina still couldn't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.thai: Despite all of this, Hina still couldn't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.ko: Despite all of this, Hina still couldn't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.zh_tw: 儘管如此，陽奈還是想不明白，為什麼星野在經歷了“那件事”後，仍未離開阿拜多斯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管如此，日奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 尽管如此，阳奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 尽管如此，阳奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduced himself to everyone, which was immediately got under fire. But the director didn't care, and said that given the current situation, it was true that the Foreclosure Task Force had invaded their own private lands. He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.jp: Kaiser Director introduced himself to everyone, which was immediately got under fire. But the director didn't care, and said that given the current situation, it was true that the Foreclosure Task Force had invaded their own private lands. He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.thai: Kaiser Director introduced himself to everyone, which was immediately got under fire. But the director didn't care, and said that given the current situation, it was true that the Foreclosure Task Force had invaded their own private lands. He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.ko: Kaiser Director introduced himself to everyone, which was immediately got under fire. But the director didn't care, and said that given the current situation, it was true that the Foreclosure Task Force had invaded their own private lands. He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事向各位介紹了自己的身份。眾人對PMC理事開始口誅筆伐，但後者並不在乎。就事論事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他們的私有土地，並大方地指出自己是為了尋找阿拜多斯地底下的某個寶貝，而這些兵力也絕非為了入侵阿拜多斯。眾人很不相信，理事於是便現場演示了“如何真正處置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: Kaiser Director made a call and said that Abydos High School's credit was at all-time low, and the interest rate would be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answered the call and was greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also said that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advised them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one was willing to step a step back. Hoshino said that it was useless to argue here and suggested to leave first.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director made a call and said that Abydos High School's credit was at all-time low, and the interest rate would be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answered the call and was greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also said that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advised them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one was willing to step a step back. Hoshino said that it was useless to argue here and suggested to leave first.
desc.thai: Kaiser Director made a call and said that Abydos High School's credit was at all-time low, and the interest rate would be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answered the call and was greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also said that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advised them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one was willing to step a step back. Hoshino said that it was useless to argue here and suggested to leave first.
desc.ko: Kaiser Director made a call and said that Abydos High School's credit was at all-time low, and the interest rate would be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answered the call and was greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also said that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advised them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one was willing to step a step back. Hoshino said that it was useless to argue here and suggested to leave first.
desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事打了個電話，表示阿拜多斯學校的信用已降到最低，並上調了30倍利率。在社團室的綾音收到了來電，大受震撼。凱撒理事表示，為了證明還款能力，他們必須先提前交納一筆保證金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此時便提出讓他們放棄學校，進行退學或轉學。眾人拒不後退。星野表示在這裡爭論沒有用，提議先行離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的绫音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的绫音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的绫音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。
